scenario.title: Test case -Not Signed-In
scenario.step: Then User see the text 'Sign In' must be displayed
Then User see the panel must slide down showing two account options 'Oracle Account' and 'Cloud Account'

Then User verify Oracle Account must have options:
option Sign in Create an account Help
java.lang.AssertionError

Then User verify Cloud Account must have only option:
option Sign in

Then User Click on Oracle Account each links:
OptionLinkappropriate page Sign InSign inSingle Sign On - Login Sign InCreate an accountCreate Account Sign InHelpAbout Your Oracle Account

Then User Click on Cloud Account each links:
OptionLinkappropriate page Sign InSign inOracle Cloud
